description.oldValue:
Ability for Admins to view and manage in single place all third-party app subscriptions they’ve purchased from Teams Admin Center, easily adding more licenses for the purchased subscriptions, cancel, upgrade and downgrade subscriptions and access invoices.
GA date: September CY2022
description.newValue:
Ability for Admins to view and manage in single place
all third-party app subscriptions they’ve purchased from Teams Admin
Center, easily adding more licenses for the purchased
subscriptions, cancel, upgrade and downgrade subscriptions and access invoices.
